name: Lost & Found (Melaina Nichole)
description:
Help your animal friends find all their missing objects! How fast can you find all 5? 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

 E - Magnifying Glass

=====

Created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021!
